title.rendered: P3 / FFP3 Respirator Mask VALVED- Box of 10

content.rendered:
HIGHEST PROTECTION FROM AIRBORNE INFECTION

The Strapit 5820 P3/FFP3 Particulate Respirator provides maximum protection against potentially infections aerosols/air.

When fitted correctly the 5820 P3 disposable respirator mask with exhalation valve offers the maximum protection against bacteria and viruses.

The 5820 is a cup style P3 mask and is individually packed to ensure individual cleanliness and easy storage.

The exhalation valve will allow the user more comfort and to wear for extended periods when needed (upto 8 hours) without heat and moisture build up.

The FFP3 mask (European Standard) is the closest model to the P3 (Australian Standard) and N99 (USA Standard). All masks achieve a similar standard.

excerpt.rendered:
• FFP3 rated mask to EN149 standards (lab reports available upon request)
  • Highest protection from airborne infection – 99%
  • Built in exhalation valve allowed more comfort for the user
  • Cup model and design
  • WHO recommends FFP3 for healthcare workers
  • Single Use
  • 3 Year Shelf Life
